attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You fool, you are going to KILL London City! I don't work there and even I can see that. These bright sparks can work wherever they like, it won't be London, with 50% tax and bonus TAX too. What will we remember GORDAN BROWN FOR? Destroying the CITY! Geneva here we come!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
